check_healthy_pod.command: kubectl get pods -n {namespace} | egrep cair | grep -v gui | grep Running | grep '1/1' | sed "s/(.* ago)//"

cluster_ip.command: kubectl get httpproxy -n {namespace} | grep cair | awk -F' ' '{print $2}'

air_pod_max_count.command: kubectl get pods -n {namespace} | egrep cair | grep -v gui

envoy_pod_check.command: kubectl get pod -n {namespace} | grep envoy | grep trf | grep -q '1/1' && echo Healthy || echo Unhealthy
